word_mean: 露出欲者，露出狂者：患露出欲的人

sentence.Network_en: I'm an exhibitionist, and I get off on the entertainment we give people.
sentence.Network_cn: 我这人爱出风头，能让大家高兴我就觉得很来劲儿。

sentence.Network_en: The exhibitionist desires to attract attention to himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 好表现的人渴望吸引人们注意自己.

sentence.Network_en: Playing strip poker with an exhibitionist somehow takes the challenge away.
sentence.Network_cn: 和一个暴露狂玩扑克脱衣服就失去成就感了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE填空分类词汇汇总--来自新东方扬子江老师... ... voyeur 偷窥狂 exhibitionist 暴露狂 ingrate 忘恩负义的.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... exhibitionism 露阴癖 exhibitionist 裸露癖者 exhibitive 起显示作用的.
英文排球术语 - 豆丁网 ... Double attacker 两手都能扣球的队员 Exhibitionist 好出风头的运动员 Fake smasher 佯攻队员.
a　一个 - 喜欢旅游及木工的人-宝哥 -... ... exhibit vt. 展览；展出 exhibitionist 好自我表现者 exhibiton 展览，表现，出风头.

list.abs: anyone with a slight exhibitionist streak can don a frilly nightcap and stay on this iron bed in full view of the neighbours , with a chair , candle and a " door to nowhere " for comfort .任何有点想出风头的人都可以戴上有褶边的睡帽，躺在完全处在邻居视野内的铁床上，旁边再放上一把椅子、一支蜡烛和“无处不在的门”就更舒服了。
好出风头的运带动 exhibitionist, grandstander好莱坞大片 Hollywood blockbuster
would you consider yourself an exhibitionist ., 你认为自己出风头.
linda was frightened to death by that exhibitionist ., 琳达被那个暴露狂吓得要死.

entry.def: An exhibitionist is someone who tries to get people's attention all the time by behaving in a way that most people think is silly.

means.word_mean: 1. someone with a compulsive desire to expose the genitals
2. someone who deliberately behaves in such a way as to attract attention

stems_affixes.word_buile: prohibit[v.禁止,不准;阻止]+ive……的→adj.抑制的,价格昂贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 放荡不羁的, 不受抑制的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+inhibit[v.抑制,约束]+ed……的→adj.放荡不羁的, 不受抑制的
exhibit[v.展出,陈列 n.展览品,陈列品]+ion表名词→n.展览会;陈列,展览
exhibition[n.展览会;陈列,展览]+ist人→n.喜欢出风头的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抑制;阻止,禁止;[心]感情阻力
stems_affixes.word_buile: inhibit[v.抑制,约束]+ion表名词→n.抑制;阻止,禁止;[心]感情阻力
prohibit[v.禁止,不准;阻止]+ion表名词→n.禁止;禁令,禁律
pro前面+hibit拿住→在前面拿住→不让前进→禁止

sentences.cn: 儿童天生喜欢自我表现。
